title: The Behavior Gap: Why You Don't do What You Say You Want to with Carl Richards

If you have listened to our Book Club Episode, one of the books we have mentioned is "The Behavior Gap'' by Carl Richards. So to further talk about how insightful this book is, we invited him to our show to talk about behavior gap, values-based financial choices, and finding the answer to the phenomenon of â€˜why you don't do what you say you want toâ€™.
